title: Patch 7.3 (updated client open beta) turned into Windowed?!
body: Why patch 7.3 updated client windowed like legacy client? Isn't there any way to make it full-screen again?

replies.body: You should be able to change your game to full screen through the in-game options.  Just select Video options while in a game, and swap Windowed to Full Screen.  Alternatively, some PC's can toggle fullscreen by pressing Alt+Enter.  I hope that helps!
